body:
@carns please have a version for bmi its tied to `main` branch for time being and this causes issues when trying to put specs in buildcache since it cant find version. See https://github.com/spack/spack/blob/9e2d78cffc1beaec2c6e4c3a379c17f25a35b31f/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/bmi/package.py#L17. 

spack will give a warning because its not a version. 

```
==> Warning: Missing a source id for bmi@main
```

Please consider having a release i dont see any in https://github.com/radix-io/bmi/releases.
title: bmi versions
